full_text:
Page 315
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 8/10/2019 11:30 AM >>>
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
It is frankly unbelievable to me that BOP is issuing public press releases on this before telling us basic information so that we can relay it to his attorneys who can relay it to his family. When can we expect to get either some sort of statement we can pass along to counsel as accurate and reliable or have a call with someone?
I understand from the Marshals that they have been unsuccessful in reaching anyone with authority at BOP, and given the BOP press release that was just put out I assume we need to speak with someone there. Please advise.
Thank you.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:43 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov> wrote:
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
As you might imagine, we are getting increasingly frantic calls from defense counsel who continue to be seeing information in the press that we—the U.S. Attorney's Office—haven't yet received. We need to know as soon as possible the very basic facts, such as time and cause of death at the absolute minimum. It has now been hours since this was reported publicly. Please advise when we can expect to receive either a written report on those basic facts or when we can have a call to get that information to relay to his counsel. It is extraordinarily frustrating to have to tell them that we have less information than the press. Please advise.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
On Aug 10, 2019, at 08:46 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov> wrote:
Passed away. We are completing a significant incident report for HQ for Death of a Federal Inmatehowever, I do not have any specifics from the BOP yet.
From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 8:44 AM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov>
Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Re: Automatic reply: Epstein update
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Thank you for telling us. What do you mean by “passed”?
Thanks,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Sent from my iPhone
On Aug 10, 2019, at 8:18 AM, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov> wrote:
BOP just provided another update- Epstein has passed. I have no additional info. I will push out updates as we receive.
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 7:52 AM
DOJ-OGR-00024850

text_blocks.content:
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665

It is frankly unbelievable to me that BOP is issuing public press releases on this before telling us basic information so that we can relay it to his attorneys who can relay it to his family. When can we expect to get either some sort of statement we can pass along to counsel as accurate and reliable or have a call with someone?

I understand from the Marshals that they have been unsuccessful in reaching anyone with authority at BOP, and given the BOP press release that was just put out I assume we need to speak with someone there. Please advise.

As you might imagine, we are getting increasingly frantic calls from defense counsel who continue to be seeing information in the press that we—the U.S. Attorney's Office—haven't yet received. We need to know as soon as possible the very basic facts, such as time and cause of death at the absolute minimum. It has now been hours since this was reported publicly. Please advise when we can expect to receive either a written report on those basic facts or when we can have a call to get that information to relay to his counsel. It is extraordinarily frustrating to have to tell them that we have less information than the press. Please advise.
Passed away. We are completing a significant incident report for HQ for Death of a Federal Inmatehowever, I do not have any specifics from the BOP yet.

From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 8:44 AM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov>
Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Re: Automatic reply: Epstein update
Thank you for telling us. What do you mean by “passed”?
BOP just provided another update- Epstein has passed. I have no additional info. I will push out updates as we receive.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the death of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are heavily redacted, with many names and email addresses obscured.
